init.title: Qube Heat Pump Options
init.description: Set the ID for the Qube heat pump (1-247). For example, keep it at 1 when only a single heat pump is connected, or choose 2, 3, etc. when multiple pumps share the same Modbus gateway. Enable "Add hub label" to append the hub label such as "(qube1)" to entity names so they are easier to recognise when multiple devices are configured.
